entry.title: No one listens
entry.summary: Maintenant je vais prendre le temps de le faire. Over the years the most common designer complaint has always been "No one listens" and "UX isn't a priority/understood", so I want to throw something controversial out there: Some of this is our doing. A quick(ish)…
entry.content:
Maintenant je vais prendre le temps de le faire.

Â 

Over the years the most common designer complaint has always been "No one listens" and "UX isn't a priority/understood", so I want to throw something controversial out there:

Some of this is our doing.

A quick(ish) thread on why and how to fix it ðŸ§µ#uxdesign #design #ux
